name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Odoo Engineer with 13+ years of experience in **Python** and database management, skilled in data migration and integration techniques. Proficient in conducting business process analysis to optimize systems and deliver effective solutions. Expertise in system administration ensures robust and scalable implementations. Strong background in technical support and documentation skills enhances communication with stakeholders.
Additionally, I have experience in full stack development across the healthcare and financial industries, working with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have a solid foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms, deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. A well-rounded professional with a commitment to compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards.
